alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:14AM EDT until July 29 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Defiance County in northwestern Ohio... Northern Putnam County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Paulding County in west central Ohio... Henry County in northwestern Ohio... Southeastern Williams County in northwestern Ohio... Fulton County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 415 AM EDT. * At 314 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fayette to near Defiance to 6 miles east of Paulding, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Defiance, Napoleon, Wauseon, Archbold, Swanton, Delta, Leipsic, Deshler, Liberty Center, Continental, Holgate, Mcclure, Hamler, Texas, Malinta, Florida, West Leipsic, Belmore, Miller City, and New Bavaria. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Williams
